alert.note: Alert for Panola; Quitman; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tunica, southwestern Tate, northeastern Quitman and northwestern Panola Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crenshaw, or 16 miles southwest of Senatobia, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Sardis, Coldwater, Como, Crenshaw, Sledge, Strayhorn, Pleasant Grove, Falcon, Askew, Buxton, McGhee, Longtown, Tibbs, Sarah, Horatio, Cypress Corner and Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
